abilities.name: Power Saver
abilities.effect: As long as the number of Pokémon in play (both yours and your opponent's) that has Team Aqua in its name is 3 or less, Team Aqua's Kyogre can't attack.

attacks.name: Aqua Trip
attacks.effect: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokémon is now Confused. If tails, the Defending Pokémon is now Asleep.

attacks.name: Aqua Smash
attacks.effect: If the Defending Pokémon is affected by a Special Condition, this attack does 50 damage plus 20 more damage.
